# [Story] ORB-053: Add YouTube full integration

## Parent Epic

Parent: #518 (Platform Integration)

## Description

Implement comprehensive YouTube integration including video upload from Orbit, scheduled publishing, comment management, and full analytics suite.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Video upload with resumable upload support for large files
- [ ] Scheduled publishing with timezone-aware scheduling
- [ ] Comment management including view, reply, moderate, and bulk actions
- [ ] Full analytics including watch time, retention, traffic sources, and demographics
- [ ] Playlist management and video organization features

## Technical Notes

- Use YouTube Data API v3 with resumable upload protocol for videos >100MB
- Implement OAuth with youtube.upload, youtube.readonly, and youtube.force-ssl scopes
- Store video processing status and poll for completion before enabling analytics
